description: Allows the user to transform themselves into a full body jacket that can be worn by another individual. While being worn, the user can take control of the wearer's body and utilize their physique and powers, combining the strengths of both individuals.

users.circumstances: Kelly uses the fruit to transform into a jacket that his brother Bobby wears, combining Kelly's speed and skill with Bobby's strength and durability.

abilityReveals.description: The user transforms into a jacket that can be worn by another person, allowing the user to control the wearer's body.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Kelly transforms into a jacket and has Bobby wear him to fight Boo in the Corrida Colosseum tournament.

abilityReveals.description: While being worn, the user can control the wearer's movements and actions, effectively combining both individuals' abilities.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Kelly controls Bobby's body while being worn as a jacket, using Bobby's strength with Kelly's fighting skills.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Requires cooperation with another person to be effective
The user is vulnerable while in jacket form if not being worn

strengths.strength: Combines the abilities and strengths of two individuals
strengths.description: The user can merge their abilities with the wearer's physical attributes, creating a powerful hybrid fighter.

strengths.strength: Allows control of someone else's body
strengths.description: The user can take over the movements of the person wearing them, potentially using their strength or devil fruit powers.
